item.title: Happy Birthday, Mr. President
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-21-1800-0100-happy-birthday-mr-president.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: : Happy Birthday, Mr. President Date sent: December 21, 2023, 18:00 +0100 To: Emmanuel Macron Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-21-1800-0100-happy-birthday-mr-president.pdf Mr. President, Exactly five years ago to the day, on December 21, 2018, I registered the domain name Macron-Emmanuel.com to launch an unofficial website about you, Mr. President. My intention has always been benevolent.

item.title: Open Letter to French Foreign Office Minister Catherine Colonna, French Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary, Consul General Guillaume Roy, forwarded to Ambassador Burns and U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11_1353_0800_open_letter_to_colonna_lortholary_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Open Letter: Urgent Request for Resolution and Clarification on Critical Matters Date sent: December 11, 2023, 13:53 (China Standard Time) To: Catherine Colonna (French Minister for Europe and Foreign Affairs), Bertrand Lortholary (Ambassador of France to China), Roy Guillaume (France Consul General - China) Cc: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Edward Lehman I asked Assistant Legal Attach√© to forward my communication to:

item.title: Chris Kempczinski, CEO of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, is asked if Kevin Ozan‚Äôs departure is related to the criminal RICO case targeting them.
item.description: Click this link to see the original LinkedIn post. Dear Mr. Kempczinski, Is Mr. Ozan‚Äôs departure related to the criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation and if yes, to which extent is it related? (look at the screenshot üëá to understand) You also mention Mr. Ozan‚Äôs ‚Äúunwavering integrity,‚Äù could you please confirm he reported internally my stern warnings about the crimes McDonald‚Äôs is engaging into? As the CFO, he obviously should have understood McDonald’s Corporation is engaging in money laundering, shouldn’t he?

item.title: Nicolai Tangen and NBIM‚Äôs executives asked who is the anti-money laundering officer at Norges Bank Investment Management
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Date sent: May 2, 2023, 15:29 (Beijing time) Cc: Nicolai Tangen (CEO of NBIM) Cc: Ida Wolden Bache (Governor of Norges Bank), Trond Grande (Deputy CEO of NBIM), Carine Smith Ihenacho (NBIM), Dag Huse (CRO of NBIM) Open letter/communication, submitted via a LinkedIn post, to Nicolai Tangen, CEO of Norges Bank Investment Management corporation, and CC’ed to various executives and the @FBI, in reply to his LinkedIn post whether ‚ÄúCan you spot the dragon?

item.title: Trond Grande and Dag Huse are asked about Carine Smith Ihenacho‚Äôs email address
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Email address of the Chief Compliance Officer Ms. Carine Smith Ihenacho Date sent: April 6, 2023, 23:43 (Beijing time) To: Trond Grande (Deputy CEO of NBIM), Dag Huse (CRO of NBIM) Dear Messrs. Grande and Huse, My name is [REDACTED FOR PRIVACY (note: but I of course gave them my real name)]. I attach a scan of my expired passport and my current Chinese driver‚Äôs license.

item.title: I tell the FBI that I want to help them understand one of the biggest frauds in history, the frauds committed by McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and their accomplices
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-07_1334_0800_fbi_I_want_to_help_you_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Mr. Rogalski, I want to help you understand one of the biggest fraud in history Date sent: February 7, 2023 at 13:34 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department) Cc: Edward Lehman Note: since Assistant Legal Attach√© Adam Rogalski told me on 2021-09-20 that he was ‚Äúone of the FBI representatives,‚Äù I assume that this communication was transfered to the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI).

item.title: Crime report sent by email, to among other people, Nicole Belloubet, Fran√ßois Molins, R√©my Heitz, H√©l√®ne Davo, and Emmanuel Macron
item.description: From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Report of Crimes Date sent: January 25, 2019, at 00:44 (China Standard Time) To: Nicole Belloubet, Fran√ßois Molins, among other people Cc: R√©my Heitz, H√©l√®ne Davo, Emmanuel Macron, among other people On January 25, 2019, at 00h44 (China Standard Time), I sent an email to, among other people, Nicole Belloubet, Fran√ßois Molins, R√©my Heitz, H√©l√®ne Davo, and Emmanuel Macron. In this email, I alerted them about the critical dysfunctions of the French judicial system.

item.title: Hunger Strike. Reply from French Law Professor Yves Strickler
item.description: Note: this email has been redacted for brevity. Check the French version of this page for the full content. Key point: French law professor Yves Strickler didn’t disapprove the possibility for me to do a hunger strike to protest the repeated violations of my fundamental rights by France. For the record, I am now accusing McDonald‚Äôs of having corrupted French officials. It might help to explain why McDonald‚Äôs France and McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, and their accomplices, have never been indicted for serious fraud and money laundering in France.

item.title: French Minister of Justice Nicole Belloubet formally notified of forgery and use of forged documents at the Versailles Court
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2018-10-23_2006_0800_belloubet_notifiee_mcdonalds_faux_et_usage_de_faux_baj_tgi_versailles_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Forgery and use of forged documents at the Legal Aid Office of the Versailles Court? Date sent: October 23, 2018, at 20:06 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Nicole Belloubet On October 23, 2018, at 20:06, I formally notified French Minister of Justice Nicole Belloubet about the grave incident at the Legal Aid Office of the Versailles Court. This office had intentionally altered a date to unjustly dismiss my appeal against McDonald’s France and one of their accomplices, thus committing a serious crime under French law.

item.title: Forgery and use of forged documents at the Legal Aid Office of the Versailles Court
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2018-10-23_1934_0800-faux-et-usage-de-faux-baj-versailles_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Forgery and use of forged documents at the Legal Aid Office of the Versailles Court? Date sent: October 23, 2018, at 19:34 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Bernard.KEIME@justice.fr, Veronique.Malbec@justice.fr, Christophe.Mackowiak@justice.fr, Vincent.Lesclous@justice.fr, Marc.Cimamonti@justice.fr On October 23, 2018, at 19:34, I alerted high-ranking French magistrates, encompassing both public prosecutors and judges, about a grave incident at the Legal Aid Office of the Versailles Court.

item.title: Email sent to the Minister of Justice, Nicole Belloubet, to beg her to respond to me.
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2018-03-19-s-il-vous-plait-madame-belloubet.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: PLEASE Date sent : March 19, 2018, at 22:07 (China Standard Time). To: Nicole Belloubet Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2018-03-19-s-il-vous-plait-madame-belloubet.pdf Dear Madam Minister, I sent you a request last week. I implore you, please give me an answer, even if it’s negative. But please say something. I understand that you must be very busy.

item.title: The adversarial procedure is the only rule to guarantee, and article 40 of the French Code of Criminal Procedure
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2018-01-03_2310_0800-article-432-1-code-penal-et-corruption-passive-par-carrierisme_Redacted.pdf From: Yves Strickler (French law professor) Subject: Re: Article 432-1 of the French Criminal Code and passive corruption due to careerism Date sent: January 03, 2018, 23:10 (China Standard Time) To: Vincent B. Le Corre Professor of Law Yves Strickler highlighted a fundamental principle to me: “It is essential to remember that the adversarial procedure is fundamentally the only rule to guarantee. It is only through this procedure that we can hope to see the truth come to light.

item.title: List of individuals targeted by Article 432-1 of the French Criminal Code (to obstruct the execution of the law)
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2017-07-16_1843_0800_yves-strickler_Redacted.pdf From: Yves Strickler (French law professor) Subject: Re: 2 questions Date received: July 16, 2017, 18:43 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Vincent B. Le Corre Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2017-07-16_1843_0800_yves-strickler_Redacted.pdf In his explanation, Law Professor Yves Strickler presented me with a pertinent reference from a legal expert text, emphasizing key aspects: The excerpt details the list of individuals targeted by Article 432-1 (to obstruct the execution of the law) of the French Criminal Code, a list that is not exhaustive but primarily includes:

item.title: Email from Law Professor Yves Strickler - procedural contracts invented by the bar associations, jurisdictions, and legal aid offices
item.description: Date received : July 4, 2017, at 17:33 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2017-07-04_1733_0800_yves_strickler.pdf Email from Professor Yves Strickler, Associate Professor of Law Faculties, confirming to me that procedural contracts are invented by the French bar associations, French jurisdictions, and French legal aid offices (BAJ - Bureaux d’Aide Juridictionnelle), and that this is something truly preposterous! That the law is the law, and French institutions are obligated to respect it.

item.title: Email from Professor Yves Strickler, Associate Professor of Law Faculties - request for provisional admission to legal aid and summary proceedings
item.description: Date received : July 4, 2017, at 01:42 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2017-07-04_0142_0800_reply_from_law_professor_yves_strickler.pdf I had written to Professor Yves Strickler, Associate Professor of Law Faculties, to ask him if, in his opinion, my request for provisional admission to legal aid was admissible. He confirms that my request for provisional admission to legal aid appears to be admissible. Moreover, he is surprised that I have not initiated summary proceedings in my employment case in which I was dismissed in 2010 for striking.

item.title: FORMAL NOTICE to McDonald‚Äôs executives, including future CEO Chris Kempczinski, about the illegality of the McDonald‚Äôs Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2017-02-14-FORMAL-NOTICE-ILLEGAL-LOTTERY-USA_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: FORMAL NOTICE : ILLEGAL LOTTERY USA Date sent: February 14, 2017, 23:21 (Beijing time) To: Chris Kempczinski, Steve Easterbrook, Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com>, Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Deborah Wahl <Deborah.Wahl@us.mcd.com> THIS EMAIL CONTAINS WHAT I BELIEVE TO BE VERY IMPORTANT LEGAL INFORMATION. DON‚ÄôT DISREGARD IT! Dear Sir or Madam, This a formal notice to warn you that your McDonald‚Äôs Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States actually qualifies, to the best of my knowledge, as an illegal lottery!

item.title: Notification to McDonald‚Äôs executives Gloria Santona, Steve Easterbrook, and Malcolm Hicks
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) SUBJECT: defamation against my consumer protection websites DATE: December 8, 2016 at 00:05 (Beijing time +0800) TO : Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Steve Easterbrook, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> I forgot to mention‚Ä¶ As for me, I am going to file a lawsuit against ‚ÄúX‚Äù (but targeting McDonald‚Äôs) for, among other things, defamation. Indeed, it seems some of your executives were behind some defamatory comment against my websites. One such comment was saying that my website was the fraud.

item.title: Debbie Schroeder, Investors Relations, McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, is still looking for the information I asked.

Le Corre Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2015-12-30_2249_0800_reply_from_debbie_schroeder_mcd_investors_Redacted.pdf Hi, X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) - Thank you for passing along your questions ‚Äì I am still looking into them and will get back to you as soon as possible.

item.title: Transcript of the phone conversation with the FBI‚Äôs Field Office of Chicago
item.description: Transcript of the phone conversation between me and the FBI‚Äôs Field Office of Chicago. I called them on December 23, 2015, at 20:30 (8:30pm) Beijing time.

item.title: F.B.I. Chicago answers the victim asking him to please contact the FBI's Public Access Line
item.description:
On 2015-12-18, I receive an answer from the Intake Unit of the Field Office of the F.B.I. in Chicago.

FROM : Chicago@ic.fbi.gov

To: Vincent B. Le Corre

SUBJECT: RE: McDonald’s massive fraud in Europe

item.title: Email sent to the F.B.I. Washington Field Office on December 16, 2015. McDonald‚Äôs Corporation.
item.description:
This email was sent to the F.B.I. Washington D.C. Field Office on December 16, 2015 at 15:00 Beijing time.

FROM : [Whistle-blower‚Äôs email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information about me

TO : washington.field@ic.fbi.gov

SUBJECT: McDonald‚Äôs massive fraud in Europe

item.title: PLEASE STOP THE FRAUD!
item.description: From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: please stop the fraud! Date sent: 2015-10-30 at 22:25 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Steve Easterbrook, Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> Dear Mr. Easterbrook, dear Ms. Santona, and dear Mr. Hicks, I repeat again. Please stop the fraud. You must make it stop! I know you know this ‚Äúgame‚Äù is a fraud under European laws. You can not possibly be so stupid not to understand except if you don‚Äôt understand on purpose so that you can later claim plausible deniability.

item.title: Eric Andrieu, lawyer, PeÃÅchenard & AssocieÃÅs
item.description: From: Eric Andrieu (P√©chenard & Associ√©s law firm) To: Vincent B. Le Corre On October 27, 2015, I received an email from McDonald‚Äôs France lawyer √âric Andrieu of the P√©chenard & Associ√©s law firm. https://archive20210730.auxjournalistes.com/docs/emails/McDonaldsReceivedFrom/2015-10-27-16h00-Eric_Andrieu_Avocat_McDonalds_France_Redacted.pdf The lawyer commits an exceptionally serious mistake (legal malpractice) by confirming ‚Äúto [his] clients that the sweepstakes [note: actually a serious fraud] was in compliance with French and European law.‚Äù This is obviously false. Either he is dangerously incompetent, or he is complicit.

item.title: Malcolm Hicks, Corporate Vice President of McDonald‚Äôs Europe and General Counsel
item.description:
On October 23, 2015, I receive an email from Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> who is the Corporate Vice President of McDonald‚Äôs Europe.

From: Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com>

Subject: France Monopoly Game Query

Date received: October 23, 2015 at 05:34 +0800 (Beijing time)

To: Vincent B. Le Corre

item.title: Additional frauds; email sent to McDonald‚Äôs General Counsel CCed to McDonald‚Äôs CEO
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: additional frauds Date sent: 2015-10-22 11:06 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com> Cc: Steve Easterbrook Ms Santona, Thank you for answering me. Could you please make sure the French team communicate with me by email? Normal mail takes forever for me to receive now that I live in China and I am not going to wait one month to act if there is an ongoing fraud.

item.title: Reply from Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description: KEY POINT OF THIS EVENT: By acknowledging that McDonald‚Äôs Corporation executives ‚Äútake such inquiries seriously‚Äù, McDonald‚Äôs Corporation can’t claim plausible deniability anymore. Furthermore, the email from Ms. Santona who is the General Counsel of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation is CCed to the CEO of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation Steve Easterbrook. Click on this link to visualize the original email: MCD–2-2015-10-21-23h47CN_Redacted.pdf From: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com> Subject: Re: update Date receivedÔºö2015-10-21 23:47 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Vincent B. Le Corre

item.title: Email sent to Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, requesting an update
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: update Date sentÔºö2015-10-21 22:45 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com> Cc: Steve Easterbrook Ms. Santona, I would like to give a friendly reminder that I gave McDonald‚Äôs a deadline of October 22nd 2015 midnight GMT time. So you have about 36 hours left. It was 4 entire days which is more than enough considering I‚Äôve sent my first cease and desist letter back in 2012.

item.title: Email to McDonald‚Äôs executives asking them to stop the ongoing McDonald‚Äôs Monopoly fraud immediately
item.description: From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: STOP THE FRAUD NOW! Unfair Commercial Practices Act EU LAW Date sentÔºö2015-10-21 14:20 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Steve Easterbrook Cc: Robert Gibbs (Robert.Gibbs@us.mcd.com), Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Kevin Ozan <Kevin.Ozan@us.mcd.com>, Jim Sappington (Jim.Sappington@us.mcd.com), Mike Andres <Mike.Andres@us.mcd.com>, Nawfal Trabelsi (Nawfal.Trabelsi@fr.mcd.com), Isabelle Kuster (Isabelle.Kuster@fr.mcd.com), Alexis Bourdon (Alexis.Bourdon@fr.mcd.com), Hubert Mongon (Hubert.Mongon@fr.mcd.com), Christophe Chapuis (Christophe.Chapuis@fr.mcd.com), Xavier Royaux (Xavier.Royaux@fr.mcd.com), Fran√ßoise de Borda (Francoise.deBorda@fr.mcd.com) Dear Ms. Santona and dear Mr. Easterbrook, I know you people must be very busy executives but I beg you to please take 5 minutes to read this page and the part about misleading omissions :

item.title: Warning sent to McDonald‚Äôs executives about being an accessory after the fact
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Accessory after the facts Date sent:: October 21, 2015 at 12:33 (Beijing time +0800) To:: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com> Cc:: Steve Easterbrook, Robert Gibbs (Robert.Gibbs@us.mcd.com), Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Kevin Ozan <Kevin.Ozan@us.mcd.com>, Jim Sappington (Jim.Sappington@us.mcd.com), Mike Andres <Mike.Andres@us.mcd.com>, Nawfal Trabelsi (Nawfal.Trabelsi@fr.mcd.com), Isabelle Kuster (Isabelle.Kuster@fr.mcd.com), Alexis Bourdon (Alexis.Bourdon@fr.mcd.com), Hubert Mongon (Hubert.Mongon@fr.mcd.com), Christophe Chapuis (Christophe.Chapuis@fr.mcd.com), Xavier Royaux (Xavier.Royaux@fr.mcd.com), Fran√ßoise de Borda (Francoise.deBorda@fr.mcd.com) Dear Ms. Santona, I am surprised that the French website carrying the fraud hasn‚Äôt been taken down yet.

item.title: 4th formal notice sent to the executives of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation to keep warning them that McDonald‚Äôs France has engaged in a pattern of racketeering activity
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Translation of yesterday’s email Date sent: October 21, 2015, 12:01 (Beijing time) To: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com> Cc: Steve Easterbrook, Robert Gibbs (Robert.Gibbs@us.mcd.com), Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Kevin Ozan <Kevin.Ozan@us.mcd.com>, Jim Sappington (Jim.Sappington@us.mcd.com), Mike Andres <Mike.Andres@us.mcd.com> PLEASE FIND HERE THE TRANSLATION OF THE EMAIL I SENT YOU YESTERDAY. Mesdames, Messieurs, Dear Sir or Madam, Je vous ordonne de faire cesser imm√©dia

item.title: Fraud of the century: emails to McDonald‚Äôs executives
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Fraud of the century Date sent: October 20, 2015 at 03:13 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com> Cc: Steve Easterbrook, Robert Gibbs (Robert.Gibbs@us.mcd.com), Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Kevin Ozan <Kevin.Ozan@us.mcd.com>, Jim Sappington (Jim.Sappington@us.mcd.com), Mike Andres <Mike.Andres@us.mcd.com> Ms. Santona, First of all, I want to thank you for having taken my phone call today without hanging up on me right away. Your counter-part in France, Mme de Borda, always refused to communicate with me through phone.

item.title: ‚ÄúI sold my soul to McDonald‚Äôs‚Äù
item.description: This book contains a crucial evidence that McDonald’s Corporation executives could have easily, through a simple phone call, stop the ongoing frauds which were happening in France, and later in Europe. Then, why didn’t they? In addition to the fact that there is an undeniable proof that, contrarily to what Gloria Santona said, this was a French problem, the book offers additional insights about how McDonald’s seems to corrupt politicians. To gain a clearer understanding of the sequence of events in this case, I invite you to view a detailed timeline at the following link:

item.title: Fran√ßoise de Borda, former general counsel of McDonald‚Äôs France
item.description:
Via certified mail with proof of receipt requested

From: Fran√ßoise de Borda (Francoise.deBorda@fr.mcd.com) To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

If I recall correctly, a copy of the mail was sent to a French Ministerial Officer who I now accuse of being corrupted.

Translation coming soon. (Note of 2023-04-13: quick note, this event happened in 2012 and I published it, if I am not mistaken, on 2022-09-21T20:49:00+08:00. Back then I wrote ‚Äútranslation coming soon‚Äù but I currently don’t have time to translate what was said in French. It’s an important event but not that important compared to what I am currently explaining to the FBI which is the priority.)

Fran√ßoise de Borda, directrice juridique de McDonald‚Äôs France, me r√©ponds pour la premi√®re et pour la derni√®re fois. Elle ment.

item.title: McDonald‚Äôs Corporation v. Simon Marketing 2002-09-16
item.description: Around January 2023, I found out that McDonald‚Äôs Corporation sued their supplier under RICO. It’s an important piece of evidence because it proves that when I would keep notifying, in 2015, McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, sternly warning them that they were committing fraud, they could only have immediately understood that the roles were now reversed: McDonald‚Äôs Corporation was now the criminal and they were engaging, via their subsidiary companies, in a pattern of racketeering activity. ‚ÄúMEMORANDUM OPINION AND ORDER
